channel.title: HDR, launch option questions
channel.description:
Just downloaded Black Mesa on Steam, got a couple questions.
Under the 'High Dynamic Range' option, what's the difference between 'Full' and 'Expanded'? Or which gives better image quality?
And do launch options like -threads or -high work for Black Mesa?
Thanks.
